contentList.content: A secure container, not of this realm.
Not as clumsy or random as a crossbow; an elegant weapon for a more civilized age. Once wielded by the great Sith Lord, Darth Vader.

Lord Vader watches over you in combat. On killing an enemy, each remaining enemy within [1] of you give you +1 Intimidation. You also gain access to Lord Vader's Presence unless no enemies were in range.

Project Darth Vader's darkside in a radius of [1]. Enemies will be struck with fear unless they succeed a Wisdom saving throw against your Intimidation. For every enemy who is struck with fear, you gain 1 Strength for 2 turns.
All you are surrounded by is fear. And dead men. Every Frightened enemy within [1] of you adds 1 to your Strength.

By attacking an ally, you strike fear into the hearts of your enemies, giving them disadvantage on attack rolls for 2 turns. This also inspires obedience in your other allies, giving them advantage on attack rolls for 2 turns. The attacked ally will be knocked prone for 3 turns, and on succeeding a wisdom check, will seek revenge (with advantage on attack rolls, for 3 turns) when they get back up.
Once per combat, on striking down a foe, enemies within a range of [1] will be frightened unless they succeed a wisdom saving throw. All you are surrounded by is fear. And dead men.
Your training and connection with the force have gifted you with the reaction speeds needed to deflect projectiles, even with the blast shield down.
Your training and connection with the force have gifted you with the reaction speeds needed to intercept projectiles and send them back the way they came.
While unsheathed, the blade of this saber causes it to illuminate the surrounding area in a radius of 1m.
Sheathe your blade if you want to lurk in the shadows.
Peace is a lie. There is only passion.
Through victory, my chains are broken.
